meanings.definition: A person who haunts or frequents a place.
meanings.sent1: The haunters of the park enjoyed their daily walks.
meanings.sent2: The haunters of the library were avid readers.
meanings.sent3: The haunters of the cafe always ordered the same coffee.
meanings.sent4: The haunters of the gym were dedicated to their workouts.
meanings.sent5: The haunters of the beach loved the sound of the waves.

meanings.definition: A ghost or spirit that haunts a particular location.
meanings.sent1: The old mansion was rumored to be haunted by ghostly haunters.
meanings.sent2: The haunters of the graveyard were said to be restless spirits.
meanings.sent3: The haunters of the abandoned house played pranks on each other.
meanings.sent4: The haunters of the castle whispered eerie tales in the night.
meanings.sent5: The haunters of the forest glowed with an otherworldly light.

meanings.definition: To visit or inhabit frequently or habitually.
meanings.sent1: She haunters the local market every weekend for fresh produce.
meanings.sent2: The cat haunters the garden, chasing butterflies and birds.
meanings.sent3: He haunters the same diner for breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her childhood haunters her dreams at night.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song haunters my thoughts throughout the day.
